channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 13:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 13:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 13:05 Air alert in Dnipropetrovsk region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 🟠 12:59 WARNING !!!Threat of the use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).
item.description: 🟠 12:59 WARNING !!!Threat of the use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).#Polohiv_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
